Varhead - https://github.com/3F/Varhead
_ _ _ _ 


[1.14] 2019.09.23

    * First public release of the Varhead project. 
      
      Evaluator of user variables and more. Designed for SobaScript, E-MSBuild, and so on.
      https://github.com/3F/Varhead
            
      Previous changes can be found in:
      https://github.com/3F/vsSolutionBuildEvent
      
      The number was based on latest changes for Varhead part from vsSolutionBuildEvent project.
